Name: get REKTorized
About the game: You like action and explosions? You're longing for a change of game modes in racing games? ...and you love surprises and unique tasks? get REKTorized is here to help you out! For the amazingly low price of 0 [your currency here] you are in to explore an anti-grav combat racer like no other! Yeah I know, nobody likes walls of texts, so we will get straight to the point(s): Dive into a Story mode with plot twists, unique challenges and surprises! Race on reinterpreted tracks of old racing games! Get skilled at classic game modes like 'Single Race' or explore experimental modes like 'ParticleAccelerator' or 'HauntedCity'! Each of the 9 teams come with unique ships with unique looks, unique stats, unique voice announcements in both english and mother language from musicians or Twitch streamers! Jump right into private or public multiplayer matches with yet another one-of-a-kind game mode next to the classics! Place your name on the top of Time battle online leader boards! Listen to a great mix of rock and electronic music from well known artists of the racing game scene like 'Static-X', 'CoLD SToRAGE' or 'Rom Di Prisco' or include your own music!
